data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: A Board meeting of the company scheduled to be held on 18th July 2025 to consider and approve inter-alia the proposal for declaration of first interim dividend for the financial year 2025-26. The First interim dividend if declared will be paid to those shareholders holding equity shares whose name appear on the register of members as on 24th July 2025 (Record date: 24th July 2025). The First interim dividend if declared will be paid on or before 16th August 2025.
